:::Child then herd his "Convex" (Spelling?):::

    child you will need your strength at the alliance make sure you have 
plenty of power. if they attack,and they will, Running away will be the worst 
thing to do. stand and fight, That will be best.

:::Child turns the vulois and says in a voice not his own:::

Child: "Resistance will be futile. if you run from there wrath the wrath 
grows!!!"
